title: Artie Shaw - Begin The Beguine (1949 transcriptions) Prism
description:
ARTIE SHAW & HIS ORCHESTRA - BEGIN THE BEGUINE

01. Theme: Nightmare    [1:19]
02. Softly, As In A Morning Sunrise    [3:11]
03. Gue Le Le (aka Mucho De Nada)    [3:40]
04. He's Funny That Way    [2:57]
05. Cool Daddy    [3:04]
06. The Grabtown Grapple    [2:23]
07. You Do Something To Me    [2:49]
08. Cross Your Heart    [2:24]
09. Minnesota    [3:43]
10. Smooth And Easy    [3:19]
11. Tea For Two    [1:48]
12. I Only Have Eyes For You    [3:18]
13. Carnival    [3:07]
14. So In Love    [2:58]
15. Things Are Looking Up    [2:55]
16. Krazy Kat    [3:19]
17. Innuendo    [4:28]
18. Bedford Drive    [3:25]
19. The Pied Piper    [2:05]
20. 'S Wonderful    [2:59]
21. Let's Fall In Love    [2:07]
22. Stardust    [3:30]
23. Begin The Beguine    [3:08]

These are broadcast transcriptions from 1949, "carefully edited by Chris Pirie, the foremost authority on the swing era"

Pat Lockwood provides vocals on tracks 4, 7, 12, 14 & 21

Tracks 6 & 8 are The Grammercy Five: Artie Shaw (cl), Dodo Marmarosa (p), Jimmy Raney (g), Dick Nivelson (b), Irv Kluger (d)

It does not list the personnel for the rest of the orchestra

1987 Prism Leisure Corporation PLC
